product_name: C.A.M.P. USA Compact Oval Screwgate Locking Carabiner
long_description: Whether you're rigging a Z-pulley hauling system or ascending a fixed line, the C.A.M.P. USA Compact Oval Screwgate Locking carabiner is the right choice. Locking oval carabiners are ideal for work with pulleys and ascenders while you're caving, big-wall climbing and aid climbing. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. C.A.M.P. USA Compact Oval Screwgate Locking carabiner has a great strength-to-weight ratio.
short_description: Whether you're rigging a Z-pulley hauling system or ascending a fixed line, the C.A.M.P. USA Compact Oval Screwgate Locking carabiner is the right choice.
